title: Dont Rent! Lease with right to buy!:)
posting_body: With Apartments increasing rents every year by 5-10%, Over crowded parking lots, weird smells, noisy neighbors, poor or no help from management, It's time to get out of apartment life.
With the same qualifications, I can assist in locating a house for you to rent, plus knowing what your rent is every year, up to 5 years(increase will be only 3.75% per year).
On top of that, giving you the option to "right to buy" at the end of the lease(or anytime of the lease)
Feel free to reach out for more information and I will be happy to help
